title: Ripe_berry
author: Ripe_berry
content: Netflix the popular subscription service for watching TV episodes and movies is said to suddenly be on the ropes as they loss subscribers since April that leadÂ  to it's stock bursting into flames thereby wiping out billions of dollars in the market value. This also led to laying off of hundreds of employees. Now it seems as Netflix world is now upside down and they are hoping that advertising will be their potential saviour. Do u think that Netflix can be saved? Or Will the ropes they are on now cut off?

comments.author: libertasbella
comments.body: Netflix is selling oranges in the garden of Eden. How dense do you have to be to sell something that's freely available on so many other websites?
